name: Weed Growing: Bud Farm Games
description:
Grow your favourite Sour Diesel, Durban Poison, Purple Khush and Blue Dream weed strains!

Weed Growing:
- Place pots in your grow room
- Plant different seeds if pots.
- Give them proper water, temperature and CO2
- Use tiger bloom and weed boosters to reduce the grow time.
-.Extract buds from your plants and pack in Jars

Weed Shop:
- Keep Jars of all strains in your weed shop
- Evaluate the customer offers and market prices
- Never miss premium and VIP customers
- Avoid low bowlers and chapters
